name: Patagonia Lunar Frost Jacket - Women's
description:
Plush fleece for chalet evenings. The boxy and cropped silouette is great for après lounging.Made of deep-pile polyester fleece.Full length zipper with thick pile collar.Elasticized hem gives a slight bubble finish.Cropped length.
